lines.text: [Hogo Fogo takes a sip of the Kolaloka Lemonade]
No, gentlemen; neither the former, nor the latter. But...
[Hogo Fogo takes his fake beard off. The Sheriff produces a "Wanted" poster from his pocket and compares the picture with Hogo Fogo at length]
Yes, Hogo Fogo, with twelve notches on the handle of my Dellinger!
I'll need to put on my woolens.
Allow me to introduce my collaborators. This is Coyote Kid, and this is Pancho Kid.
I do not care for your kids.
I have returned. And with me comes the law!
The Kola Loka is the law.

[reading a note attached to Joe's back]
Lemonade Joe! Do you know how silly you are?
I ask whether nights are cold here.
Then I ought to take... warm underwear!
Of course you'll be mine. Here, on holy soil, my dove.

[Lands on his feet after falling some 200 feet, right in front of the hostile band, taking them by surprise. Performs some thorough finger-spinning with his twin shooters, finally aiming them at the band]
Understandably, hands up.
[Stabs his brother in the back with a corkscrewer]
Don't be surprised, father. Lou is different now. She's become better, and wants to be striven for morality in Arizona.
Yes, I want. I'm going to open a brothel there only kola-loca lemonade would be serving.
Can not express how you touched me! The Lord instiled you this idea!
